attributes.action: Give biological fathers the same amount of paternity leave as adoptive fathers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am an expectant father, with my wife about to give birth to our second child. I have recently found out that adoptive fathers in my workplace receive 3 months full pay, whilst I have to settle for only 1 week!  This is absolutely ridiculous and discriminating against us natural fathers. I want to see equal leave allowed for all fathers no matter what the circumstances.
